videos.description: Rico Dowdle of South Carolina runs five yards into the end zone to put the Gamecocks on the board.
videos.headline: South Carolina's Rico Dowdle runs for 5-yd TD

videos.description: Jake Bentley throws a short pass to Kiel Pollard, who gets into the end zone for an eight-yard South Carolina touchdown.
videos.headline: Bentley connects with Pollard for 8-yd South Carolina TD

videos.description: Jake Bentley connects with Bryan Edwards on a 24-yard pass into the end zone for South Carolina touchdown.
videos.headline: Bentley's throw successful to Edwards for  24-yd TD

videos.description: Jake Bentley throws to Rico Dowdle, who bursts into the end zone for a 22-yard South Carolina touchdown.
videos.headline: Dowdle bursts for 22-yd South Carolina TD

videos.description: South Carolina DL D.J. Wonnum is walked off of the field after an injury.
videos.headline: South Carolina's D.J. Wonnum exits game with injury

videos.description: Ty'son Williams weaves into the end zone for a 9-yard South Carolina touchdown
videos.headline: South Carolina's Williams weaves into end zone for TD

videos.description: Deebo Samuel leaps up and makes a nice one-handed catch for an 8-yard South Carolina touchdown.
videos.headline: South Carolina's  Samuel hauls in one-handed TD grab

videos.description: Michael Scarnecchia throws to Randrecous Davis who works his hands around his defender for a 27-yard South Carolina touchdown.
videos.headline: South Carolina's Davis makes amazing 27-yd TD catch
